short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to customize your new tab with cool sports backgrounds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wanted to customize your chrome new tab while keeping the soul of your browser intact? Now you can with the help of Sports Engine you can change your new tab experience to Sports Engine which is powered by Bing search and enjoy looking up for various sports or your favorite sport and keep going.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the "Sports Engine" tab extension and setting Chrome New Tab search to Bing provided by the service and the Terms of Use at https://sportengine.info/t-o-s/ and Privacy Policy at https://sportengine.info/privacy-policy/
